thread.section_title: Colonial Properties Cabin & Resort Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Colonial Properties Cabin & Resort Rentals | smokymtndreams.com
thread.title: Sherri
thread.title_full: Colonial Properties Cabin & Resort Rentals reviewed by Sherri

author: Sherri
title: Sherri
text: We use this company every time we stay at the mountains. Easy to reserve a cabin and excellent customer service. Properties are clean and well maintained. A huge variety of cabins to choose from. I highly recommend this company
